QuestData.Title: Prune the Podlings
QuestData.Description: The blood soaked body of Ryan is slumped up against the cave wall. Tiny teeth marks cover his body.$b$bThe podlings clearly are a threat to you and your garrison.$b$bIt's time to do a little pruning.
QuestData.RewardText: <You've drastically reduced the podling numbers.$b$bHopefully they won't be growing back anytime soon.>
